ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | axhil.1 | |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. |
| 2 |  | axhil.2 | |- U e. CHilOLD |
| 3 |  | axhfi.1 | |- .ih = ( .iOLD ` U ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-hba | |- ~H = ( BaseSet ` <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( BaseSet ` U ) = ( BaseSet ` <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ~H = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_hlnvi | |- U e. NrmCVec |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_h2hva | |- +h = ( +v ` U ) |
| 9 | 6, 8, 3 | #P_hlipdir | |- ( ( U e. CHilOLD /\ ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) ) -> ( ( A +h B ) .ih C ) = ( ( A .ih C ) + ( B .ih C ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_mpan | |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H /\ C e. ~H ) -> ( ( A +h B ) .ih C ) = ( ( A .ih C ) + ( B .ih C ) ) ) |
